title.value: Повышение топливной экономичности агрегатов с приводом от вала отбора мощности трактора 'Беларус'
Increase of fuel efficiency of the devices driven by power take-off shaft of 'Belarus' tractor
Increase of fuel efficiency of the devices driven by power take-off shaft of 'Belarus' tractor

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Al-Kinani, M.F., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Engine appears the main energy source and impelling power of tractor. Economic and dynamic properties of engine determine exploitation characteristics of the tractor itself and connected machine device. The most important exploitation characteristics of the tractor appear effective power output, torsion torque, fuel consumption per one hour and specific amount of fuel consumption, rotating frequency of bent shaft. While working of the tractor in the conditions of underloading fuel consumption increases that leads to fuel excess expenditure and declines economic efficiency of tractor's utilization. The questions of improving of the fuel efficiency of drive units with power take-off shaft of Belarus tractors have been examined. An example of determining of the fuel consumption of aggregates of variable mass in the tractor Belarus-3022 and manure spreader SMP-18 has been given.
